title: Counties of Bath and Alleghany Middle Mountain Momma
subtitle: A week before Mother's Day its MOMMA'S DAY.
description: 21st annual Counties of Bath and Alleghany Middle Mountain Momma is a marathon mountain bike race at Douthat State Park. Many classes available including the XXC 40 mile.
author: mike-scales
loc: Douthat State Park, Clifton Forge, VA
keywords: race, douthat state park, douthat, marathon mtb, xcm, cross country, charlottesville, richmond, xxcva lexington, xxc, enduro, bike race, mountain bike race
